ai.question: Which frame field is created by a source node and used by a destination node to ensure that a transmitted data signal has not been altered by interference, distortion, or signal loss?
Which data link layer addressing scheme is used in a point-to-point logical topology?

choice.text: Layer 2 addressing not required for this topology

ai.question: What do network hosts use data link layer addresses for?
Which three basic parts are common to all frame types supported by the data link layer? (Choose three.)
What are two characteristics of the controlled media access method? (Choose two.)

choice.text: It is known as a deterministic access method.
There are no collisions when this type of method is in use.
Any station can transmit at any time.
Bandwidth is more efficiently utilized than in a contention-based access method.
Stations must determine if the media is carrying a signal before they can transmit.

ai.question: Which of the following are sublayers of the Data Link layer?
Which of the following are data link layer encapsulation details? (Choose two.)

choice.text: A header and trailer are added.
Packets are changed into bits for Internet travel.

ai.question: What is achieved by the encapsulation process at the data link layer?

choice.text: Data is packaged into a packet.
Data is converted for Internet transmission.
